name: Flying Rockets
description:
you move by touching the edge of the screen (right or left) Maybe it will be one of the hardest game you will play i have to admit it it's really hard ! even in the Easy mode ! (Easy and Hard Levels not limited but the Noobs level is Limited)

The Noobs level will be the hardest i guess! so i made it that you can't play it before playing 10 normal games.

 you can buy other colors for the player using the coins you will find in the game.
 you can't find any coins in the noobs level .
